<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hippopotamus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=699)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Typical adult hippos move quickly on land and attack stealthily in the water. Though herbivorous, hippos are notoriously aggressive and territorial.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Hippopotamus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=699)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +6

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 5 minutes.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 85

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +13,
**Damage** 1d10+8 bludgeoning

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" />  30 feet

**Capsize** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) The hippopotamus tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The hippopotamus must succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check with a DC of 25 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the hippo) or the pilot's [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) DC, whichever is higher.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, foot, DC 23

</column>
